title: ffmpeg命令整理
content:
https://www.jianshu.com/p/2a824f13b2af

视频转音频

ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -vn -y -acodec copy output.m4a

合并音频和视频

ffmpeg -i video.mp4 -i audio.wav -c:v copy -c:a aac -strict experimental output.mp4
